TEXT.English: Additional Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only spread to cities on the historical route[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot spread after 1500 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Attracted by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Additional company resources (especially Silk resources)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Adopting the Merchant Trade or Free Enterprise civics[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Location is in Central Asia or Persia[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Markets and Stables[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trade routes[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Deterred by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Location is in China[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Coastal cities without a Harbor[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Christian state religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Too many other companies present

TEXT.English: Additional Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only spread to cities belonging to the Spanish, French, English, Portuguese, Dutch or Viking civilizations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot spread after 1800 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only spread to cities in the Caribbean, Sub-Saharan Africa, South Asia or cities that have the Trading Corporation National Wonder[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only spread into coastal cities[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Attracted by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Additional company resources[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Adopting the Colonialism or Free Enterprise civic[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Being the Dutch civilization[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Harbors, Customs Houses, Banks, Trading Company (National Wonder)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities in the Caribbean[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trade routes[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Deterred by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Too many other companies present
TEXT.French: Prérequis additionnels:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peut se propager uniquement dans les villes appartenant aux Espagnols, aux Français, aux Anglais, aux Portugais, aux Néerlandais ou aux Vikings[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ne peut se propager passé 1800 ap. J.-C.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peut se propager uniquement dans les Caraïbes, l'Afrique subsaharienne et l'Asie du Sud ainsi que dans les villes avec la compagnie commerciale (merveille nationale)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peut se propager uniquement dans les villes côtières[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Attirée par :[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ressources industrielles supplémentaires[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Doctrines Colonialisme et Libre entreprise[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]La civilisation néerlandaise[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ports, postes de douane, banques, compagnie commerciale (merveille nationale)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Villes situées dans les Caraïbes[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Routes commerciales[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Repoussée par :[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Présence d'autres industries
